as an introductory offer CBOE isn't charging commission, but normally would. there is margin so you have a small amount of leverage (meaning you can deposit 44% of the price of a bitcoin and buy a future for a whole bitcoin). but if the price falls you will have to add more money

so bitcoin price is $16900 on CBOE reference (gemini). consider alice needs to pay Bob 1BTC in a month for some online work he's doing. she doesnt have BTC and is worried the price may go up, so she deposits $8000 and locks in the 1month price at $16900 (with margin).
